COOK DUH MAN SOME F EGGS B {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
Wow

Yeah I play pretty much only ARAM and can I just say, Riot, that I'm not at all on board with your choice to unlock all of the champions.. there are a number of champions I do not own that I do not want to own and I have chosen not to acquire for very specific reasons. Now I can understand the free champ rotation, as annoying as it is to me personally. However my ARAM queue has dropped drastically in enjoyment since the unlocking of every champ. I don't know if it's possible to lock back up the champs I don't own but if it is please do so.
